abstract: The tributes to Steve Jobs, the Apple co-founder who died Wednesday, continued to flood social media platforms from around the world on Thursday.
snippet: The tributes to Steve Jobs, the Apple co-founder who died Wednesday, continued to flood social media platforms from around the world on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: The tributes to Steve Jobs continued to flood social media platforms from around the world on Thursday with millions of 140-character messages on Twitter, more than 3,000 videos uploaded onto YouTube and tens of thousands of people sharing news links and making comments on Facebook.

headline.main: Tributes to Steve Jobs Flood Social Media Platforms
